verbs.description: russia [V: is] preparing to search for a nuclear - powered missile that was lost at sea months ago the operation will include three vessels one of which is equipped to handle radioactive material from the weapon nuclear core hans kristensen nuclear information project moscow federation of american scientists missile barents sea vladimir putin norway russia
